book.synopsis: When a serial killer targets the local brothels, Jocelyn Kingly, a champion for less fortunate women, soon discovers that the strange amulet in her possession holds the key to the murders as well as to the true nature of her friend vicar Amadeus Fallow and the man she loves, Lucien Valin. Original.
